DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine long-term weight loss safety CP-945,598 obese adult
DOC.brief_title: A Long-Term Study To Examine The Effects Of CP-945,598 On Weight Loss And Safety
DOC.detailed_description: The CP-945,598 program terminate November 3 , 2008 due change regulatory perspective risk/benefit profile CB1 class likely new regulatory requirement approval . No safety issue involve termination decision .
DOC.criteria: Obese adult body mass index > = 30 kg/m2 ; > = 27 kg/m2 obesityrelated comorbidities include hypertension dyslipidemia Pregnancy Diabetes Adults serious unstable current past medical condition
